About Bradley

Born in 1998 and raised on Long Island, New York, Bradley Caravana is a student at Farmingdale State College studying Computer Programming & Information Technology with a minor in Web Development; he is expected to graduate in May 2021. Bradley has achieved and maintained a grade point average of 4.0 and has received numerous academic awards, including The Student Award for Academic Excellence, the most prestigious academic award offered by Farmingdale State College.


Bradley's goals with this website are to showcase his web development skills and to layout the work he has completed in his career thus far. He has considerable academic experience coding in C++, HTML5, CSS, SASS (this portfolio was styled using NodeSass), and front end JavaScript.


If you're interested in working with Bradley, get in touch using the contact form or email him at carabc@farmingdale.edu.


Thank you.
